questDescription->[faction_name] is ready to grant [pawn_definite] the title of [newTitle] and the power of a level [psylinkLevel] psylink in a bestowing ceremony.

The bestower will arrive by shuttle and perform the ceremony.

The bestower will only give a title if any throneroom requirements are satisfied.

You can betray the bestower to steal psylink neuroformers, but this will make [faction_name] your enemy.

If you miss or fail this ceremony, there will be another opportunity later. If the bestower or guards are harmed for any reason, there will be diplomatic consequences.
